remarks: The morphisms of a subcategory are a subset of the morphisms of the original.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)
statement:
subcss1.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( Subcat ` C ) ) $.
subcss1.2 $e |- ( ph -> J Fn ( S X. S ) ) $.
subcss2.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
subcss2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
subcss2.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
subcss2 $p |- ( ph -> ( X J Y ) C_ ( X H Y ) ) $.
